UnitDefinition.Name: Point of departure types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Point of departure types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Unspecified (no conversion to common expression type)
Unit.Description: Do not convert non-standard point of departures.

Unit.Name: BMD (convert all hazard characterisations as BMDs)
Unit.Description: Convert all point of departures to bench mark doses.

Unit.Name: NOAEL (convert all hazard characterisations as NOAELs)
Unit.Description: Convert all point of departures to NOAELs.
